title: Meet the American Pro who Quit Racing to Become a DJ: ‘Headlining Red Rocks is My New Tour de France’
content:
Promising US talent Jared Scott walked away from the dream of a pro life to chase a different kind of beat as a DJ: 'I miss 20-minute threshold efforts.'

Read the full article at Meet the American Pro who Quit Racing to Become a DJ: ‘Headlining Red Rocks is My New Tour de France’ on Velo.
author: ahood
